Aries: Aries risings usually have distinct facial features—often birthmarks or scars—and a baby‑faced look with a strong nose, flashy smile, sparkling eyes, and a reddish hair or complexion.
Taurus: Taurus risings tend to have large round eyes, small ears, dark curly hair, and symmetrical, pleasing facial features that radiate sensual comfort.
Gemini: Gemini risings feature a highly expressive mouth, bright delicate eyes, a friendly smile, and a slim, graceful limb structure.
Cancer: Cancer risings display full, round faces with soft features, high cheekbones, and very expressive, trusting eyes.
Leo: Leo risings command attention with a full mane of thick hair, a well‑shaped face, and a dazzling smile framed by strong teeth.
Virgo: Virgo risings have gentle, delicate noses, curvy lips, bright clear eyes on an oval face, and a lean, health‑conscious musculature.
Libra: Libra risings are blessed with symmetrical faces, good complexions, defined noses, pouty or Cupid‑bow lips, and heart‑shaped or oval contours.
Scorpio: Scorpio risings possess magnetic, piercing eyes, sharp features with prominent cheekbones, dark eyebrows, and pouty lips.
Sagittarius: Sagittarius risings have open, broad‑foreheaded faces, cheerful expressions, highly expressive eyes, and well‑defined mouths.
Capricorn: Capricorn risings often look older than their years, with serious expressions, deep‑set eyes, strong noses, and straight hair.
Aquarius: Aquarius risings stand out with unique facial structures—high, wide foreheads, half‑smile lips, and inquisitive eyes.
Pisces: Pisces risings feature dreamy expressions on soft, round faces, baby‑fine hair, sensual lips, and large, watery eyes.
